meanings.definition: Giving or involving advice or guidance
meanings.sent1: She appreciated his consultive approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent2: The consultive session with the counselor was very helpful.
meanings.sent3: The consultive cat seemed to be giving tips on catching mice.
meanings.sent4: Her consultive tone was like a beacon of wisdom in the room.
meanings.sent5: The consultive nature of the book made it a valuable resource.

meanings.definition: Seeking or giving advice or guidance
meanings.sent1: He had a consultive attitude when facing challenges.
meanings.sent2: The consultive behavior of the team members was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The consultive squirrel was looking for the best nut-gathering strategies.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of decisions, her consultive compass never failed.
meanings.sent5: The consultive quest for knowledge led to many discoveries.
